# W0142-24X003 - Fire Extinguishers Maintenance
=============================================

**Tender Notification - Request for Standing Offer**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a standing offer on the repair, maintenance, and inspection of fire extinguishers at Canadian Forces Base Suffield, Ralston, Alberta. The tender reference number is WS4213922671.

**Contract Details**

- **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 30, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: November 30, 2024, with option periods

**Notice Type**

This is a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) procurement method, where suppliers are invited to submit a standing offer for the provision of goods or services over a specific period.

**Supplier Selection Criteria**

- **Lowest Price**: The selection of suppliers will be based on the lowest price submitted.

**Scope of Work**

The contract requires a qualified person to perform the following tasks:

- **Repair**: Restore fire extinguishers to their original condition
- **Maintenance**: Perform routine inspections and maintenance to ensure fire extinguishers are in good working condition
- **Inspection**: Conduct visual and hydrostatic testing of fire extinguishers
- **Testing**: Perform testing in accordance with NFPA 10 Standard for Portable Fire Extinguishers (2018 Edition) and CAN/ULC – S532 Standard for the Regulation of the Servicing of Portable Fire Extinguishers

**Site and Work Location**

The contract will be performed at Canadian Forces Base Suffield, Ralston, Alberta.

**Attachments**

No attachments are required for this tender invitation.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact Willy Zumbado Diaz, PSPC/SPAC, at willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Details**

- **Tender Reference Number**: WS4213922671
- **Bid Submission**: Tender submissions must be received by November 10, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time. Any submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

You can view the full tender details and submission instructions on the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17625476](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17625476).
